last_episode_to_air.name: Justice?
last_episode_to_air.overview: A new trial begins and uncovers the culture of oppression against those who speak out; Amish abuse survivors band together to seek justice and test whether history will repeat itself.

name: Sins of the Amish
overview: A group of Amish survivors takes a stand against century-long traditions to speak out against oppression in the hopes of effecting change for future generations.

episodes.name: The Unveiling
episodes.overview: A group of Amish survivors and experts expose the private world of Plain communities and the abuse fueled by their customs; forbidden from engaging with outsiders, one brave survivor reports family members to the police, which culminates in a trial.

episodes.name: Justice?
episodes.overview: A new trial begins and uncovers the culture of oppression against those who speak out; Amish abuse survivors band together to seek justice and test whether history will repeat itself.
